column1: Candle Warmer with Country Star in Kettle Black
column4: For the person who hesitates to burn a candle, we have the answer! The bulb in our Candle Warmer melts the candle, in just a few hours, as it sits in our unique metal rack giving a scent without any open flame. Use our candle warmer refills or melt regular jar candles up to 4 3/4 wide or oval candles that do not fit in ceramic warmers. Plus you get the added benefit of a lovely nightlight that cast patterns of light on nearby walls! 1 candelabra socket, 60 watts maximum; Bulb included. Always use a straight sided jar candle for warming, not included. Made in the USA.

column1: Edison Bulb - 25 Watt Candelabra Base
column4: Our replicas of the 1910 Edison Bulb design has been revamped and is now a flame tip bulb that will add that Edison Bulb appeal to your chandelier. Lasts 2x longer - 3000 hours. Clear glass, candelabra base. Deco carbon style filament. Imported. Wattage: 25 watts. .

column1: Edison Bulb - 40 Watt Standard Base
column4: Our replicas of the 1910 Edison Bulb design is reminiscent of the vacuum tubes used for vintage radio sets and glows with squirrel cage style carbon filaments. Rated for 3000 hours. 40 watt standard base. Clear. Imported. Wattage: 40 watts. Standard Base. .

column1: Edison Bulb - 60 Watt Standard Base
column4: Our replicas of the 1910 Edison Bulb design is reminiscent of the vacuum tubes used for vintage radio sets and glows with squirrel cage style carbon filaments. Rated for 3000 hours. 60 watt standard bulb. Clear. Imported. Wattage: 60 watts. Standard Base. .

column1: Edison Pendant
column4: Our Edison Pendant is a simple conically shaped pendant that has some decorative punched holes to release any heat build up. This is a great piece for use in an industrial or farmhouse setting. Includes canopy kit and 7-feet of black clutch wire for hardwire installation. Standard socket, 1 x 60 watts maximum wattage. .

This piece takes a memory from Irvin's past and transform it into a unique and eye catching pendant. Includes canopy kit and 7-feet of black clutch wire for hardwire installation. Standard socket, 1 x 150 watts maximum wattage. .

column1: Federal Panel in Blackened Tin
column4: Lovingly pierced with designs that recall the beauty and warmth of country life, our panels are the ideal way to enhance cabinet doors throughout your home. Use our panels to create a country mood in your kitchen, den or family room; the possibilities are endless. Also are great for furniture projects. Punch pattern may be placed towards the inside of the cabinet for a traditional look;  Turn the punch pattern around for a rough primitive appearance. Made in the USA.
